name: Treasure Island (itch) (esthion)
description:
Treasure Island is a visual novel game I created for fun with some assets I found online.

I hope you enjoy my game!

Special thanks to the following creators for their assets (some modified by me):

Main Menu click sound -

SplatFreeSound: https://freesound.org/s/413690/

Game Soundtrack -

Tim Beek: https://timbeek.itch.io/dystopian

GUI -

NingNing: https://wningningw.itch.io/visual-novel-gui-pack-001-green

Background Image Assets -

Knickknack PJ: https://knickknackpj.itch.io/forestandcavebg

Anastasia Romanova and Vadim Zalepaev: https://machaon-maackii.itch.io/dark-forest-backgrounds

J. Claudee (Sraye): https://sraye.itch.io/distant-places-background-pack/purchase

Oleksandr Pidvalnyi: https://www.pexels.com/photo/girl-wearing-pink-dress-standing-on-bridge-above-tr...

Character Image Assets -

AS-Adoptables: https://www.deviantart.com/as-adoptables

Butter Milk: https://butterymilk.itch.io/awfully-sweet

MarwaMJ: https://marwamj.itch.io/2d-monster-character

Banya and Princessbarb21: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=52&t=42689

Red Chan: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=52&t=45090
